question: 王様
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>king</kanji> (<kanji>formal name ender</kanji>) is the <vocabulary>king</vocabulary>, and you're talking to him politely. He's the king after all! If you don't he might behead you!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This word consists of the on'yomi reading for <ja>王</ja> and the kun'yomi reading for <ja>様</ja>. You've learned them both so you should be able to read this word too!
